summary: Web app with authentication flow. Login is broken — users get stuck in an infinite loading state when attempting to log in.
known_issues: Login screen hangs indefinitely (infinite loading) — users cannot authenticate

existing_features.title: Fix the login page so that users are no longer stuck in an infinite loading state when authenticating via Internet Identity. The login flow must complete successfully and redirect the user to their appropriate dashboard (admin or hotel) or to profile setup if no profile exists.

projectName: Fix infinite loading on login page
